EmailTemplate.description: This Template will be used to send the Account Code to the Business Owner that will help them register an existing or new Business
EmailTemplate.name: Security Code Email-Business path
EmailTemplate.subject: Business Security Code from eSLA
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This message is automatically generated based upon a request for a security code submitted to the State of Wisconsin.
*Please do not reply to this email*
Dear {!Email_Notification__c.Param4__c}
{!Email_Notification__c.Recipient_Contact__c} has requested your business security code through the online licensing portal. Sharing the security code will give the requesting user access to the business licensing account which includes the ability to edit and delete data and make licensing payments on behalf of the business.
If you authorize this request, please direct the user to log in to eSLA at https://esla.wi.gov/dashboard and take the following steps:
Click your name in the top right hand corner Select “Manage Business” Expand the “Add Existing Business” section Enter your security code: {!Email_Notification__c.Param3__c} Click Submit
Thank You, eSLA Team
